GetColTests¶

extremals.GetColTests(data, keys=None, exclude=[], normalized=False)[source]¶

Returns a list of ColTest, one for each specified column.

Parameters:
  • data (pandas.DataFrame) – dataframe
  • keys (list) – list of columns to use, default None: all columns used
  • exclude (list) – list of columns to exclude, default empty
  • normalized (bool) – parameter passed to the returned tests
Return type:

list

extremals
